onyomiExamples.meaning: the art of war, martial arts, military arts, military force, the sword, valor, bravery, military officer, military man
weapon, arms, ordnance, weapon (something used to gain an advantage), asset
literary and military arts, the pen and the sword
traveling about to gain skill in combat (travelling)
Kenmu era (of unified Japan) (1334.1.29-1336.2.29), Kenmu era (of the Northern Court) (1336.2.29-1338.8.28)
Black Tortoise (god said to rule over the northern heavens), seven mansions (Chinese constellations) of the northern heavens
